title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, long-armed cross, back and chain stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Narrow bands of pattern at the top followed by alphabets and numerals; wider bands at the bottom with the lamb of God, Adam and Eve with the Tree of Knowledge, and a crucifixion, with spot motifs.
name: Sampler
